title: Sarah Owen – 2022 Comments on the Conduct of Liz Truss
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Sarah Owen, the Labour MP for Luton North, on Twitter on 4 January 2022.
content: If Liz Truss had my Covid symptoms right now, she’d have no idea whether she was eating at Hertford Street or a Harvester.
My sense of smell and taste have completely gone but at least I still have the sense of decency to not spend £1.4k of taxpayers’ money on a posh Tory lunch.
